content: **knitted jumper in drops melody the piece is worked top down in stocking stitch with european yoke sizes xs - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #rockybeachsweater drops design pattern ml-129 yarn group d ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops melody from garnstudio belongs to yarn group d 200-250-250-300-300-350-350 g colour 03 pearl grey **needles** drops circular needle size 5 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 5 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 15 stitches in width and 19 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 5 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
